title: This hate on yasuo is so funny
body:
I was accustomed to hating crybabies here on the boards, i used to cry occasionaly about champion bullshit too back when i was bronze, but this is getting out of hand... Aren't you tired of crying? Did it occur to you that you need to find ways to beat him?

Besides, Fervor of Battle is being reworked and it will more beneficial to go AD mid now instead of Tank top. I find Tanksuo irritating too but it's not THAT BIG of a deal....

Unrustle your jimmies

replies.body:
Don't really have a problem with him either since he's always banned.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
and if he isn't banned?
if i didn't ban yasuo, i would ban ur champion you wanted to play
tbh I only ban Yasuo so that my teammates won't pick him. Yasuo players like OP always find a way to jump in 1v5 and suicide now matter how far ahead they get lol
i don't even main the champ
and thank god you don't. You'd be even more cancer if you did
what is wrong with you.... calling me cancer? why? did i even call you something? Aren't you a bit too aggressive for no reason? You better check that attitude, especialy if you talk like that irl...

> [{quoted}](name=Hi Im Vasilis,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KugZtbEf,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-03T08:38:55.818+0000)
>
> what is wrong with you.... calling me cancer? why? did i even call you something? Aren't you a bit too aggressive for no reason? You better check that attitude, especialy if you talk like that irl...

Oh look, a keyboard warrior. "Better not talk like that irl, I'll beat you up herp derp".

But seriously, don't defend yasuo. I ban him even if my teammates have him selected. I will NOT play a game with Yasuo in it, I just wont. He's not fun to play with or against. His wall mechanic makes him a 100% ban for me, I simply will not play against it.

It's not that he can't be beaten, it's just so unfair as an ability and I refuse to play around it. Most yasuo's are bad, especially when they're on my team for whatever reason, so I decided I will ban him when I get to ban, ask for him to be banned if not, and quit if neither team bans him if he get's picked.

I WON'T PLAY AGAINST YASUO.
PERIOD.

There are many other people just like me, so there is no point in defending him. He could have all of his abilities nerfed, and I would still 100% ban him. Remove the wall from his kit, or he will continue to be removed from every game  I play in. 
/end rant

"Keyboard warrior" lmao
I didn't even say that i'd beat you up, i couldn't care less. I've never met you and i never will, but others will. Unless you live in a cave somewhere far away from civilazation, there will be people around you, and it will suck to be you when someone there is pissed of with your tough attitude...

Refuse to play against yasuo all you want, not that it matters anyway.
nah i'm usually a nice person, haven't been banned in 2 years, but I don't lay off when it comes to yasuo players lmao

i haven't been banned, ever. not even chat restrictions. I happen to value my money.
Yes, i play yasuo, i enjoy playing yasuo, but i don't  main him. Your salt doesn't concern me or anyone else.

I never said you as a person were toxic, just that you're gameplay is toxic. I mean seriously, you main yasuo and zed. Don't act like you haven't jumped in 1v5 at least a few hundred/thousand times this season.

Thanks for enlightening me in the fact that my salt doesn't concern you. It would've been nice to know before I took the time to reply to your, oh, I don't know, four replies to me. They just made me feel like you were concerned a little bit. Just a little.

Look, I don't hate you or anything. Behind every Yasuo and Zed main is a kind, sane person on the inside. It's just completely masked by your desire to play champs like Yasuo and Zed.

Dude, It's not the champion's problem if you refuse to learn how to beat them. Talk shit about Yasuo all you want, but Zed? Seriously? His main damage is a skillshot... Have you ever heard of sidestepping? I guess no.
Lol, and what if the guy that wants to play zed in your team is good? Whatever, your games, your call. it's not like you're ever gonna ban Zed for me
lol I told you I only hate it when zed and yasuo are on my team, not the enemy team. The people who play them are trash lmao

I don't hate him because he's good, he's usually feeding if anything. I hate him because he's so obnoxious, always dashing around and shrieking, and giving a false illusion of skill since he's so flashy. Plus his mains are the most likely to to ridiculous shit like flashing a mastery emote after collapsing 4v1 on the half health Soraka. 

So yeah, screw alcoholic windy samurai, screw his HASAGI!s and screw his mains.

it isn't that he's hard to deal with, or anything like that. 

His kit is simply cancer, infinite dashes and a wall better than most champs ultimates. 

If they put his w on like a 30 second cooldown, he'd be fine.
it's at 26. close enough
It should be 30 seconds at all ranks, with the width still increasing.
I'm with OP on this one. I never understood the Yasuo hate when champions like Leblanc who is 1000x worse exist.

I mean you play 90% cancer champions so I guess you making a QQ thread about Yasuo being unfun to play with/against makes sense. It isn't how hard something is to beat, it is how fun it is to play around. Yasuo is miserable to play with or against. So he is banned for this reason. People 'cry' for this reason. They don't like misery, it's a video game, no amount of knowing how to beat him will change the anti-fun that any single ability in his kit is.
